ej,johnm005,P,samuj901,Intentional HBP ej,mccll001,M,samuj901,Intentional HBP Mike Johnston and Pirates Manager Lloyd McClendon ejected by HP umpire Jack Samuels; Coach Mackanin manages the rest of the game

ej,mccll001,M,gormb901,Arguing with LaRussa ej,larut101,M,gormb901,Arguing with McClendon $a Mike Gonzalez high, inside pitch caused Tony Womack to hirt the dirt; Cardinal Manager Tony LaRussa yelled at Gonzalez from the dugout; Pirates manager Lloyd McClendon ran out of his dugout towards the St Louis dugout; two umpires tried to restrain him; LaRussa came out and the two managers yelled at each other with umpires between them; both benches and bullpens emptied; Scott Rolen had suffered a concussion two days earlier after being hit on the head; both managers were ejected by HP umpire Brian Gorman
originally scored as double, changed next day

ej,kennj001,P,nauep901,Fighting with Jason Kendall ej,kendj001,P,nauep901,Fighting with Joe Kennedy $Jason Kendall took a few steps towards 1B and then charged the mound when Joe Kennedy yelled something; a brawl ensued and both players ejected by HP umpire Paul Nauert
